results.title: Carcase constructions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Basic woodwork”.
Using a knife box as an example, this film describes how boards can be joined at the corners. No other credits available.

results.title: Saws
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Basic woodwork”.
Show correct stance for using saws. Points out main part of a saw, and gives description of the teeth found in various types of saw. From the series “Basic Woodwork”.

results.title: Basic woodwork: Preparing the wood
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Basic woodwork”.
After explaining the need for making a rough sketch and dimensional drawings of the article to be made, this film goes on to explain the drawing up of a cutting list of the sizes of the various pieces of wood required for the job.

results.title: East meets West
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “BBC Monitor”.
A musical encounter uniting European and Indian music in a session of improvisation. Famous English guitarist Julian Bream is accompanied by Alla Rakha playing the Tabla and Ali Akbar Khan, a virtuoso of the Indian sarod - a four stringed instrument similar to the lute. Note: ‘East West Encounter’ appears at the end of the film.
results.description:
